name: Heroes Of Maidan 2
detailed_description:
Lead the army of heroes, General Zmyshenko, fight for the independence of the great Ukraine, build fortifications to repel the onslaught of the enemy.
- 3D5.0 graphics
- Many heroes
- Construction base
- Air battles like battlefield
- Tank battles like the world office of Tuttles

Soon will be added:
- New heroes and levels
- Water battles in the Kerch Strait
The game is exclusively entertaining. The author does not set the goal of insulting, humiliating, or discriminating on the basis of nationality of race, gender, opinion, profession, or other harm. Remember! Always together, no matter how, no matter where ...

short_description: Generalisimus Zhmyshenko Valery Albertovich led a crusade on the Donbass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
